page.title: 16ASLACKBY-HEALTH & EDUCATION
page.content: {HEALTH Aslackby itself does not have any emergency services, and its residents have to travel to surrounding villages or towns to get help. The nearest police service is at Billingborough as is the doctor.There is another doctor at Corby Glen, 9 miles away, and a surgery of his at Rippingale. {EDUCATION Aslackby school became a private house when it closed around 1965. Many older people of the village remember attending the school. The grounds still remain, with the playground now being a large garden. The primary children are now bussed to Pointon C.of E., 3 miles away, while the secondary pupils are either sent to the Aveland School in Billingborough, or Bourne Grammar,7 miles away.
